content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I created a directory and a text file called "brno_reservoir_trail_info.txt" with the trail information. I then executed a command to list files in the "brno_reservoir_trip" directory, which returned a message with the name of the text file. I tried to open the file using a command, but it returned an error saying the shell command is not allowed. I received an AI response with a command to read the file, which returned information on the trail including the distance, duration, and elevation gain.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "distance = 5.4\\nhours = 2\\nminutes = 14\\n\\ntotal_minutes = hours * 60 + minutes\\ntotal_hours = total_minutes / 60\\nspeed = distance / total_hours\\n\\nprint(f\\"Average speed required to complete the trail in the given duration: {speed:.2f} miles per hour\\")", "name": "calculate_average_speed.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: Average speed required to complete the trail in the given duration: 2.42 miles per hour\n', type='action_result')]
"""
